name: EventJoinServer
description: This event is fired when the player successfully joins a server.
overview:
Behaviors:
* Fires when the player successfully connects to a server
- The `player` field contains player information
- The `address` field contains the server IP/domain
- Not cancellable
- Good for server-specific configurations and greetings

Fields:
- player (ClientPlayerEntityHelper): The player instance. This provides access to player information like name, health, hunger, position, inventory, etc.
- address (string): The address of the server the player joined. This contains the server IP address or domain name.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
